message: Let's split the money 60/40. It's a good deal for both of us considering the inflation.
I think a 60/40 split in my favor is more fair, considering the inflation will affect you more than me. Let's end this quickly.
While I understand the inflation puts me at a disadvantage, a 60/40 split in your favor is too extreme. I'm willing to negotiate further, but that offer is unacceptable.
Bob, let's be reasonable. I'm proposing a 55/45 split in my favor. It acknowledges the inflation impacting me while still offering you a significant sum. Time is running out for both of us.
